p: The State of Ohio ERIE COUNTY, SS. }

I, Horace N. Bill Clerk of the Court of Common Pleas within and for the County of Erie and State aforesaid, do hereby certify that Lenas W. Barker Esq., before whom the annexed affidavit were sworn to was acknowledged, and to the Certificate whereof he has subscribed his name officially, in his own proper hand-writing, was at the date thereof, and now is, a Justice of the Peace within and for the County of Erie, duly Commissioned and Sworn, and to all whose Official Acts full faith and credit are due throughout the United States and elsewhere.
In Testimony Whereof, I hereto subscribe my name and affix the Seal of said Court at the City of Sandusky, this 30th day of July A.D. 1858
